definitions.definition: A cultural region and peninsula in Southeast Europe , roughly equivalent to the area covered by Albania , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Greece , Kosovo , North Macedonia , Montenegro and Serbia , sometimes including Romania , Slovenia , and European Turkey .

main_definition: A cultural region and peninsula in Southeast Europe , roughly equivalent to the area covered by Albania , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Bulgaria , Croatia , Greece , Kosovo , North Macedonia , Montenegro and Serbia , sometimes including Romania , Slovenia , and European Turkey . [19th c.]
